Posts.EditableText: Is there anything in the script to turn off an mp3 after its been started.
Posts.HTML: Is there anything in the script to turn off an mp3 after its been started.

Posts.EditableText: Another thing I'm curious if you know what this problem is. When i try to load this mp3 it say error copying file 70 : permission denied.

Posts.EditableText: Nvm figured out both. To play no song you put an mp3 script with nothing on it. and i think the error was a duplicate file.
Posts.HTML: Nvm figured out both. To play no song you put an mp3 script with nothing on it. and i think the error was a duplicate file.
